snippet: KLINGER--Ruby, on February 5, 2016, Ruby, 94, died peacefully in her Cedarhurst home. Surviving sibling of seven children of Abe and EtheI Schulman, widow of Milton, her beloved husband of 44 years, mother of Abby, (Abbott) Wool, Fred Wool, Karen Bush, and Kenny, grandmother to Cara, Chris, Jeff, Jen, Ryan, Jacky, Josh, Leah, Sara, Matthew and Michelle, great-grandmother of Nathan, Madeline, Emma, Kinsey, Jackson and Andrew. Loving mother-in-law of Shelly and Carol. Her elegance, charm, intellect, open heart, and great wit will be missed and honored forever. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KLINGER--Ruby, on February 5, 2016, Ruby, 94, died peacefully in her Cedarhurst home. Surviving sibling of seven children of Abe and EtheI Schulman, widow of Milton, her beloved husband of 44 years, mother of Abby, (Abbott) Wool, Fred Wool, Karen Bush, and Kenny, grandmother to Cara, Chris, Jeff, Jen, Ryan, Jacky, Josh, Leah, Sara, Matthew and Michelle, great-grandmother of Nathan, Madeline, Emma, Kinsey, Jackson and Andrew. Loving mother-in-law of Shelly and Carol. Her elegance, charm, intellect, open heart, and great wit will be missed and honored forever. 1/3
